item.title: Report E-2023090747
item.description:
Report E-2023090747

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-26
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On September 26, 2023, at 1845 EST, XPO Logistics Terminal LBL experienced approximate 1 cup release of UN2796 “Sulfuric Acid 1.8N (with 40mg/l Manganese Sulfate)” from a 5-gallon poly pail. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct all cleanup and containment. On September 27, 2023, at 2155 ET, contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1 cup of product released to a 1’ x 1’ area of the trailer floor due to a puncture. Soda ash and absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted area to neutralize and clean the release. The damaged pail, impacted absorbents, and cleanup debris were containerized into a 30-gallon poly drum. All waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
